name: Brunch Punch
description: Hearth restaurant serves this refreshing punch at their Sunday brunch, which they prepare with Finger Lakes Distilling Seneca Drums Gin from New York.
recipeIngredient: 48 ounces (6 cups) freshly squeezed grapefruit juice (juice of 5 fruits)
Sliced cucumber and orange, or other citrus, for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pitcher, combine all the liquids; stir gently. Float some of the wheels of cucumber and oranges on the punch. Ladle punch into rocks glasses filled with ice, and garnish with cucumber and orange.
